pullrequest.title: Config and cmake fixes for Windows build

content.raw: @\_jrivero\_ @azaclauson, I'm looking at all the library paths you added for plugins/tests ect.... and I don't think they are necessary. I've made my own set of windows changes which you can see on the windows_zmq branch on my fork [here](https://bitbucket.org/peter_mitrano/gazebo/pull-requests/new?source=peter_mitrano/gazebo%3A%3Awindows_zmq&dest=peter_mitrano/gazebo%3A%3Adefault#diff), but I didn't need to add any of that. So convince me why we need them I guess? I haven't tried running it yet, but everything linked.

I've made my own set of windows changes which you can see on the windows_zmq branch on my fork here, but I didn't need to add any of that. So convince me why we need them I guess?
